input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item specifications and item name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item name:
East Carolina Pirates Men's Executive Watch

Item specifications:
Links Make Watch Adjustable
Stainless Steel
Men
23kt Gold-Plated Bezel
Officially Licensed East Carolina Pirates Men's Two Tone Gold Dress Watch
input_text.Response A: ECU East Carolina men's two tone gold dress watch. College s executive timepiece offers men a classic, business-appropriate look. Features a 23kt gold-plated bezel, stainless steel case and date function. Secures to your wrist with a two-tone solid stainless steel band complete with safety clasp. Look good, while supporting your favorite team. Perfect for work, the game, a party, or any formal event. Water resistant up to 3 ATM.
input_text.Response B: Show your team spirt and add some flare to your dressy outfit with this executive watch from The Memory Company. This watch features a stainless steel case and link, with a two-tone gold finish that is sure to get noticed. The bezel is 23kt gold-plated, and the watch face is green with a blackJoyeux de Venise pattern. The watch is adjustable, making it a great choice for a man's wrist.

label_annotations.feedback: Response A seems to have a typo (a floating 's'). Response B is better, but 'add some flare to your dressy outfit' doesn't read very well.
